1.name: 1. Fast Times at Ridgemont High
1.description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

2.name: 2. Cheers
2.description: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

3.name: 3. The Thing
3.description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

4.name: 4. Blade Runner
4.description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

5.name: 5. Evil Under the Sun
5.description: Agatha Christie's Belgian sleuth, Hercule Poirot, solves the murder of an actress at a Balkan resort.

6.name: 6. E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial
6.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

7.name: 7. Victor/Victoria
7.description: A struggling female soprano in 1934 Paris finally finds work after posing as a female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life when a visiting Chicago gangster finds himself inexplicably attracted to the seemingly male performer.

8.name: 8. Poltergeist
8.description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

9.name: 9. Newhart
9.description: The misadventures of an author-turned-innkeeper and his friends in rural Vermont.

10.name: 10. Conan the Barbarian
10.description: A powerful warrior seeks to avenge the genocide of his people and the murder of his parents at the hands of a snake cult.

11.name: 11. First Blood
11.description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

12.name: 12. Annie
12.description: A spunky young orphan is taken in by a rich eccentric, much to the chagrin of the cantankerous woman who runs the orphanage.

13.name: 13. Family Ties
13.description: Chronicles liberal ex-hippies Steven and Elyse Keaton, their conservative son Alex, daughters Mallory and Jennifer, and later, youngest child Andrew.

14.name: 14. Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
14.description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

15.name: 15. Tron
15.description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

16.name: 16. An Officer and a Gentleman
16.description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

17.name: 17. Knight Rider
17.description: A lone crimefighter battles the forces of evil with the help of a virtually indestructible and artificially intelligent supercar.

18.name: 18. Grease 2
18.description: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

19.name: 19. 48 Hrs.
19.description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him in order to track down a killer.

20.name: 20. 'Allo 'Allo!
20.description: In France during World War II, René Artois runs a small café where Resistance fighters, Gestapo men, German Army officers and escaped Allied POWs interact daily, ignorant of one another's true identity or presence, exasperating René.

21.name: 21. Sophie's Choice
21.description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

22.name: 22. St. Elsewhere
22.description: The lives and work of the staff of St. Eligius Hospital, an old and disrespected Boston teaching hospital.

23.name: 23. Tootsie
23.description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

24.name: 24. The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
24.description: A town's Sheriff and regular patron of a historical whorehouse fights to keep it running when a television reporter targets it as the Devil's playhouse.

25.name: 25. The Sword and the Sorcerer
25.description: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage's dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.
